title: I got Permanent suspension for no reason, if i did do something wrong there is no warning or anythin
body: I got permanent suspension, no warning, no idea what i did wrong, last thing i did was report someone for afk.

replies.body: Hmmmmm I'm looking over your account now, and I do see some activity that seems a little fishy. That suspension is most likely meant to protect your account from possible hackers. Reach out to our account team using the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so that we can go over all the details one on one.

hacker? My brother and i shared this account, sometime he would just log in when im in the middle of the game and i would do that too when he is playing cause i i dont that he was playing. and i will do that too thank you
Well Rip then accountsharing is a reason for a permaban
i was mainly the one who always play this account, i just let my brother play to gain more experience about the game since he is a newbie.
Yeah thats called accountsharing. You as the creater are the only one allowed to use the account.
and i get permanent banned from that?...
Yep it's written in the Terms of use that you agreed to that you are not allowed to do so.
Sharing accounts isn't actually allowed. And could be bannable, you should try rectify this asap or you may be banned legitly..
Please help me get my account I have been playing on this account for 5 years. I already reach out to account recovery team and message riot support.
